Company: Hudson Valley Host

We have recently expanded into our fourth location.  We are now offering VPS accounts in Lithuania.  To celebrate our new location we are offering 25% off recurring on ALL VPS packages and locations.  This sale includes unmanaged and managed cPanel VPS accounts.

**Coupon Code: newlocation25**

ALL VPS Include:
#SolusVM VPS Panel
# 99.9% Uptime
# OpenVZ Virtualization Platform
# Choice of OS
# 24/7 Support

Heres the package details for Starter VPS:
256mb RAM
512mb Burst RAM
25GB Disk Space
500GB Bandwidth
1IPv4 (no IPv6 availble as of now)

Control Panel: SolusVM

Price: $6.75 /month recurring with **coupon code: newlocation25**

Test IP/file for each location:

Dallas: http://63.143.37.161/test100.bin
New York: http://204.145.80.237/test100.bin
Scranton: http://199.168.140.89/test100.bin
Lithuania: http://77.79.11.205/test100.bin


You can see our VPS accounts here: [hudsonvalleyhost.com/vps.php](http://www.hudsonvalleyhost.com/vps.php)


[Any questions please Contact Us!](http://www.hudsonvalleyhost.com/support.php)
